weapon_rules.name: Accurate
weapon_rules.description: You can retain up to X attack dice as normal successes without rolling them. If a weapon has more than one instance of Accurate X, treat it as Accurate 2 instead.

weapon_rules.name: Balanced
weapon_rules.description: You can re-roll one of your attack dice.

weapon_rules.name: Blast
weapon_rules.description: Shoot the primary target, then shoot each visible operative within X as secondary targets. Roll each sequence separately. Secondary targets count as in cover and obscured if the primary target was.

weapon_rules.name: Brutal
weapon_rules.description: Opponent can only block with critical successes.

weapon_rules.name: Ceaseless
weapon_rules.description: You can re-roll any of your attack dice of one result (e.g., all 2s).

weapon_rules.name: Devastating
weapon_rules.description: Each retained critical success inflicts X damage. If given as distance + X, deal X damage to the target and each visible operative within that distance. The success is not discarded.

weapon_rules.name: Heavy
weapon_rules.description: An operative cannot move in an activation/counteraction in which it uses this weapon, and vice-versa. If Heavy (X only), only that move type is allowed. Doesn't prevent Guard.

weapon_rules.name: Hot
weapon_rules.description: After use, roll 1D6. If the result is less than the weapon’s Hit stat, inflict damage equal to the result ×2. Only roll once even if used multiple times.

weapon_rules.name: Lethal
weapon_rules.description: Successes equal to or greater than X are critical successes.

weapon_rules.name: Limited
weapon_rules.description: After X uses of the weapon during the battle, it is removed. Using multiple times in one action counts as one use.

weapon_rules.name: Piercing
weapon_rules.description: Defender rolls X fewer defence dice. If Piercing Crits X, effect applies only when you retain critical successes.

weapon_rules.name: Punishing
weapon_rules.description: If you retain any critical successes, you may retain one fail as a normal success.

weapon_rules.name: Range
weapon_rules.description: Only operatives within X can be valid targets.

weapon_rules.name: Relentless
weapon_rules.description: You can re-roll any of your attack dice.

weapon_rules.name: Rending
weapon_rules.description: If you retain any critical successes, you can change one normal success to a critical success.

weapon_rules.name: Saturate
weapon_rules.description: The defender cannot retain cover saves.

weapon_rules.name: Seek
weapon_rules.description: Targets cannot use terrain for cover when being selected. If Seek Light, they cannot use Light terrain. Does not remove cover saves if applicable.

weapon_rules.name: Severe
weapon_rules.description: If you do not retain critical successes, change one normal success to critical. Devastating and Piercing Crits still apply; Punishing and Rending do not.

weapon_rules.name: Shock
weapon_rules.description: The first time you strike with a critical success in each sequence, discard one of your opponent’s unresolved normal successes (or a critical if none).

weapon_rules.name: Silent
weapon_rules.description: An operative can Shoot with this weapon while it has a Conceal order.

weapon_rules.name: Stun
weapon_rules.description: If you retain any critical successes, subtract 1 APL from the target until the end of its next activation.

weapon_rules.name: Torrent
weapon_rules.description: Select a primary target normally, then select any number of valid targets within X as secondary. Shoot all in any order, rolling each sequence separately.
